titleStmt.title: The Parliament mended or ended, or, A philter and halter for the two Houses prescribed by their Doctor Mercurius Elenticus.
titleStmt.author: Mercurius Elenticus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the signe of the Traytors head, and are to be sold right over against the House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: A royalist tract urging the restoration of Charles I and the sitting of a new Parliament.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Traytors head
